HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Troškovi dostave vidljivi su u košarici prije nego što zaključite narudžbu. Uz cijenu proizvoda u koju je uključen PDV, istaknuti su troškovi dostave koji se sastoje od troškova poštarine za svaki proizvod (koja ovisi o masi proizvoda iz narudžbe).
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Ako proizvod imamo na zalihi, uobičajeni rok dostave je do 7 radnih dana, osim ako na varijanti proizvoda koji ste odabrali nije pisalo drugačije. U tom će slučaju dostava ovisiti o najduljem vremenu dostave proizvoda koji se nalazi u košarici. Zbog povećane potražnje za hit proizvodima u vrijeme velikih akcija moguće je produljenje uobičajenog roka dostave.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Troškovi dostave vidljivi su u košarici prije nego što zaključite narudžbu. Uz cijenu proizvoda u koju je uključen PDV, istaknuti su troškovi dostave koji se sastoje od troškova poštarine za svaki proizvod (koja ovisi o masi proizvoda iz narudžbe).
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Rokovi dostave madraca naručenih po mjeri ovise o dogovoru.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery and in-store pickup are the available delivery methods. Parcel shop and parcel locker options are not mentioned.
PROVIDERS: GLS is the sole courier mentioned for home delivery.
PRICING: Delivery costs are calculated in the shopping cart and depend on the weight of the ordered products. There is a cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of €1.19. Information on free shipping thresholds is not available. The cost for in-store pickup is not specified.
DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery for in-stock items is up to 7 working days, but can be longer during sales. Delivery for custom-made mattresses is by agreement.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Orders are not processed on weekends. Not all physical stores offer the in-store pickup service. An order may be delivered in multiple shipments.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is provided on a dedicated 'Dostava' page. It clearly states the delivery provider, standard timeframe, and COD surcharge. However, it lacks details on express delivery, island delivery policies, free shipping thresholds, and a list of stores available for pickup. The pricing structure is not fixed, requiring the user to add items to the cart to see the final cost.
